dialogues: Paper Hands Paul protesting high gas fees. Gimme free airdrops or I’m out!
We deserve freebies every day—no strings attached!
FOMO Freddy here—I’m just worried I’ll miss out on the next airdrop if it’s not free!
Stop charging me for my own greed!
Burnout Becky’s exhausted, but I’ll protest too!
Free airdrops = free serotonin. Sign me up!
